channel.title: Novora Solutions Blog
channel.description: Latest news, articles, and insights from Novora Solutions on software development, AI, and technology trends.

item.title: The Future of AI in Software Development
item.description: Explore how artificial intelligence is transforming the software development landscape and what it means for businesses in 2025.
item.author: contact@novorasolutions.com (Rishi Sankhla)
item.content:encoded:
The Future of AI in Software Development

Artificial intelligence is revolutionizing how we build software. In this article, we explore the latest trends and what they mean for businesses in 2025.

Key Trends

  • AI-assisted coding is becoming mainstream
  • Automated testing and debugging are reducing development time
  • LLMs are transforming requirements gathering and documentation

Read the full article to learn how your business can leverage these technologies.

item.title: Building Scalable Web Applications with Modern Technologies
item.description: Learn about the best practices and technologies for building web applications that can scale with your business needs.
item.author: contact@novorasolutions.com (Rohan Sankhla)
item.content:encoded:
Building Scalable Web Applications with Modern Technologies

Scalability is crucial for growing businesses. This article covers essential practices for building web applications that can handle increasing loads.

Key Considerations

  • Microservices architecture for modular scaling
  • Serverless functions for cost-effective operations
  • Database optimization techniques
  • Caching strategies for improved performance

Read the full article to learn how to implement these strategies in your next project.

item.title: The Rise of Progressive Web Apps in 2025
item.description: Discover why Progressive Web Apps (PWAs) are becoming the preferred choice for businesses looking to enhance their digital presence.
item.author: contact@novorasolutions.com (Rishi Sankhla)
item.content:encoded:
The Rise of Progressive Web Apps in 2025

Progressive Web Apps combine the best of web and mobile apps. Learn why they're gaining traction among businesses of all sizes.

Benefits of PWAs

  • Offline functionality improves user experience
  • Push notifications increase engagement
  • Faster loading times reduce bounce rates
  • Lower development costs compared to native apps

Read the full article to learn how to implement PWA features in your web applications.
